title: 2013 - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Mature   Romance   Sci-fi   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Drama CD   Adapted to Manhua   Apocalypse   Bickering Couple   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Gore   Gunfighters   Manly Gay Couple   Mature Protagonist   Military   Modern Day   Past Plays a Big Role   Power Couple   Shota   Strong Love Interests   Survival   Teamwork   Zombies
author: Fei Tian Ye Xiang   非天夜翔
description:
In the year of 2013, the tide of zombie outbreak exploded in everyone's homeland.

Humanity launched a large-scale battle in the endless nights awaiting for the arrival of dawn.

The end is approaching, is there going to be a way out for them?

Their faiths were shattered into pieces and buried in the ashes of the raging fire.

But within the blazing fire, a newborn hope arise once again.>
